title: Montclair Pride 2026
description: The main event! Bigger, bolder, and more fantastic than ever. Three stages, food trucks, family zone, and the ultimate dance party.

title: Volunteer Orientation
description: Join our amazing volunteer crew! Orientation for all Pride 2026 volunteers.

description: Kick off Pride Month with the Montclair LGBTQ+ community! Music drinks and celebration.

title: Community Fundraiser Dinner
description: Annual fundraiser dinner supporting Out Montclair's year-round programs.
